## docker.ServiceContainerSetProps.containerProps property

Props to apply to all [docker.DockerContainer](./cloud.docker.dockercontainer.md)<!-- -->s within this ServiceContainerSet. If a prop is specified in the source [Container](./cloud.container.md) component and in `containerProps`<!-- -->, `containerProps` will take precedence.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
containerProps?: Partial<DockerContainerProps>;
```
